testcase.name: TC05 Register User with existing email
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'.......................passed When Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When Click on 'Signup / Login' button.......................................passed When Verify 'New User Signup!' is visible...................................passed When Enter name and already registered email address........................passed When Click 'Signup' button..................................................passed Then Verify error 'Email Address already exist!' is visible.................passed

testcase.name: Add Products in Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'........passed Then User Verify that home page is visible 'Automation Exercise' successfully.passed And User Click ' Signup / Login' button.....................................passed Then User login the app.....................................................passed And User Click ' Products' button...........................................passed Then Hover over 1 first product and click Add to cart.......................passed When User Click 'Continue Shopping' button..................................passed Then Hover over 2 second product and click Add to cart......................passed And User Click 'View Cart' button...........................................passed Then Verify 1 and 2 both products are added to Cart.........................passed Then Verify their prices, quantity and total price..........................passed
